verses.verse: Oh <S%H4310>that<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H5414>were<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> a <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of <S%H1832>tears,<s%> that I might <S%H1058>weep<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H2491>slain<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people!<s%>

Oh that I <S%H4310>had<s%> <S%H5414><s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> a lodging <S%H4411>place<s%> of wayfaring <S%H732>men;<s%> that I might <S%H5800>leave<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> them! <S%H3588>for<s%> they be <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5003>adulterers,<s%> an <S%H6116>assembly<s%> of treacherous <S%H898>men.<s%>

And they <S%H1869>bend<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H3956>tongues<s%> like their <S%H7198>bow<s%> for <S%H8267>lies:<s%> but they are <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1396>valiant<s%> for the <S%H530>truth<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they <S%H3318>proceed<s%> from <S%H4480>evil<s%> <S%H7451><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and they <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Take ye <S%H8104>heed<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> of his <S%H4480>neighbor,<s%> <S%H7453><s%> and <S%H982>trust<s%> ye <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H251>brother:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> will utterly <S%H6117>supplant,<s%> <S%H6117><s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> will <S%H1980>walk<s%> with <S%H7400>slanders.<s%>

And they will <S%H2048>deceive<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> the <S%H571>truth:<s%> they have <S%H3925>taught<s%> their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H8267>lies,<s%> and weary <S%H3811>themselves<s%> to commit <S%H5753>iniquity.<s%>

Thine <S%H3427>habitation<s%> is in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H4820>deceit;<s%> through <S%H4820>deceit<s%> they <S%H3985>refuse<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H6884>melt<s%> them, and <S%H974>try<s%> them; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H349>how<s%> shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4480>for<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people?<s%>

Their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is as an <S%H2671>arrow<s%> shot <S%H7819>out;<s%> it <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H4820>deceit:<s%> one <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H7965>peaceably<s%> <S%H854>to<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> with his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> but in <S%H7130>heart<s%> he <S%H7760>layeth<s%> his <S%H696>wait.<s%>

Shall I <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6485>visit<s%> them <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things? <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> on <S%H834>such<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> as <S%H2088>this?<s%>

For <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> will I take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H1065>weeping<s%> and <S%H5092>wailing,<s%> and <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H4999>habitations<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> a <S%H7015>lamentation,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they are burned <S%H3341>up,<s%> so that <S%H4480>none<s%> <S%H1097><s%> <S%H376><s%> can pass <S%H5674>through<s%> them; <S%H3808>neither<s%> can men <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H4735>cattle;<s%> both the <S%H4480>fowl<s%> <S%H5775><s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H929>beast<s%> are <S%H5074>fled;<s%> they are <S%H1980>gone.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H1530>heaps,<s%> and a <S%H4583>den<s%> of <S%H8577>dragons;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H1097><s%> an <S%H3427>inhabitant.<s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> is the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> that may <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this?<s%> and who is he <S%H413>to<s%> whom the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> that he may <S%H5046>declare<s%> it, <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6>perisheth<s%> and is burned <S%H3341>up<s%> like a <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> that <S%H4480>none<s%> <S%H1097><s%> passeth <S%H5674>through?<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>saith,<s%> <S%H5921>Because<s%> they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> therein;

But have <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H8307>imagination<s%> of their own <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1168>Baalim,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3925>taught<s%> them:

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H398>feed<s%> them, <S%H853>even<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> with <S%H3939>wormwood,<s%> and give them <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H7219>gall<s%> to <S%H8248>drink.<s%>

I will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them also among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> nor their <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H3045>known:<s%> and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, <S%H5704>till<s%> I have <S%H3615>consumed<s%> them.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H995>Consider<s%> ye, and <S%H7121>call<s%> for the mourning <S%H6969>women,<s%> that they may <S%H935>come;<s%> and <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H413>for<s%> <S%H2450>cunning<s%> women, that they may come: <S%H935><s%>

And let them make <S%H4116>haste,<s%> and take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H5092>wailing<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> us, that our <S%H5869>eyes<s%> may run <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H1832>tears,<s%> and our <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> gush <S%H5140>out<s%> with <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H5092>wailing<s%> is <S%H8085>heard<s%> out of <S%H4480>Zion,<s%> <S%H6726><s%> <S%H349>How<s%> are we <S%H7703>spoiled!<s%> we are <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H954>confounded,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> we have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> our <S%H4908>dwellings<s%> have cast us <S%H7993>out.<s%>

Yet <S%H3588><s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> O ye <S%H802>women,<s%> and let your <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H3947>receive<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H3925>teach<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H5092>wailing,<s%> and every <S%H802>one<s%> her <S%H7468>neighbor<s%> <S%H7015>lamentation.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H4194>death<s%> is come <S%H5927>up<s%> into our <S%H2474>windows,<s%> and is <S%H935>entered<s%> into our <S%H759>palaces,<s%> to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H5768>children<s%> from <S%H4480>without,<s%> <S%H2351><s%> and the young <S%H970>men<s%> from the <S%H4480>streets.<s%> <S%H7339><s%>

Speak, <S%H1696><s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> Even the <S%H5038>carcasses<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> as <S%H1828>dung<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field,<s%> and as the <S%H5995>handful<s%> <S%H4480>after<s%> <S%H310><s%> the harvest <S%H7114>man,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall <S%H622>gather<s%> them.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> Let <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H2450>wise<s%> man <S%H1984>glory<s%> in his <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> let the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> man <S%H1984>glory<s%> in his <S%H1369>might,<s%> let <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H6223>rich<s%> man <S%H1984>glory<s%> in his riches: <S%H6239><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> let him that <S%H1984>glorieth<s%> <S%H1984>glory<s%> in <S%H2063>this,<s%> that he <S%H7919>understandeth<s%> and <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> me, <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> which <S%H6213>exercise<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> in the <S%H776>earth:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> in <S%H428>these<s%> things I <S%H2654>delight,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> them which are <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> with the <S%H6190>uncircumcised;<s%>

Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that are in the <S%H7112>utmost<s%> <S%H6285>corners,<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> these <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> in the <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
